name: DASHING Through the Snow Quiz / Test | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters from DASHING, find a 4-letter word that means to make music with the voice.
questions.explanation:
Sing.

	To sing is to make music with the mouth, and a singer is one who sings.  Singers include Rod Stewart, Beyonce, and Bob Dylan, to name only a few of the hundreds of singers out there.

questions.text: Using only letters from DASHING, find a 4-letter word for the thing at the end of an arm.
questions.explanation:
Hand.

	Most people have two hands, and most have four fingers and a thumb on each hand.  The digits on the hand are the thumb, pointer finger, middle finger, ring finger, and pinky.

questions.text: Using letters from DASHING only, find a 4-letter word meaning to put clothes on a line.
questions.explanation:
Hang.

	When you hang your clothes, you are either putting them on a clothesline to dry or putting them away in your closet on hangers.  Hangers are so named because they allow your clothes to hang.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning spoken, using only letters from DASHING.
questions.explanation:
Said.

	In a book, the most common word used when someone has talked is "said".  She said hello.  "Hello!" she said.  You could make it a little more exciting by using words like "exclaimed" or "shouted".

questions.text: Using only 4 letters from DASHING, find a part of your leg.
questions.explanation:
Shin.

	The shin is the front part of your leg just above your foot.  The back part of the lower half of your leg is called the calf.

questions.text: Using only letters from DASHING, find a 3-letter word for a card game.
questions.explanation:
Gin.

	Gin is a card game, which has several variations, such as gin rummy.  A gin can also clean cotton, and it can also be a trap for wild animals.

questions.text: Using only letters from DASHING, find a word meaning to rush, that is 4 letters long.
questions.explanation:
Dash.

	Dashing through the snow means rushing through the snow!  A dash can also mean a small amount.  For instance, a recipe may call for a "dash of salt", which means you put a very small amount of salt in.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters from DASHING, that means to profit, or to get.
questions.explanation:
Gain.

	To gain is to get an increase in profit or possessions.  It also means to obtain or to get.  If you gain the upper hand, you get control.

questions.text: Using only letters from DASHING, find a 3-letter word for a wicked deed.
questions.explanation:
Sin.

	When you sin, you are doing something wrong.  Adam and Eve were the first sinners because they ate some fruit they were not supposed to.  If you break a vase, and you tell your mom you didn't, you have sinned.

questions.text: Using only letters from DASHING, find a 3-letter word for cinders.
questions.explanation:
Ash.

	The cinders of a fire may be called ash.  When a volcano erupts, the dust it makes is also called ash.  Ash can also be a type of tree.
